title.rendered: Texas lawmakers refile Bitcoin reserve bill, adding room for more crypto

content.rendered: The bill “would make our state the first to establish a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and drive innovation, growth, and financial freedom,” said Senator Schwertner.

excerpt.rendered: The bill “would make our state the first to establish a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and drive innovation, growth, and financial freedom,” said Senator Schwertner.
